moduslam.frontend_manager.handlers.imu_data_preprocessor package

Submodules

moduslam.frontend_manager.handlers.imu_data_preprocessor.handler module

IMU data format: [

timestamp, quaternion x, quaternion y, quaternion z, quaternion w, Euler x, Euler y, Euler z, Gyro x, Gyro y, Gyro z, Acceleration x, Acceleration y, Acceleration z, MagnetField x, MagnetField y, MagnetField z ]

timestamp is not present in element`s raw data.

Transform IMU data to the base frame according to the transformation matrix tf_base_sensor: https://github.com/TixiaoShan/LIO-SAM/issues/204#issuecomment-788827042

class moduslam.frontend_manager.handlers.imu_data_preprocessor.handler.ImuDataPreprocessor(config: HandlerConfig)[source]

Bases: Handler

IMU data handler.

property name: str

Unique handler name.

process(element: Element) → Measurement | None[source]

Processes the element with raw IMU data and returns the measurement.

Parameters:

element – an element with raw IMU data.

Returns:

new measurement.

static create_empty_element(element: Element) → Element[source]

Creates an empty element with the same timestamp, location and sensor as the input element. :param element: element of a data batch with raw data.

Returns:

empty element without data.

moduslam.frontend_manager.handlers.imu_data_preprocessor.line_parsers module

Methods to parse IMU data from different datasets.

First value in the line is the timestamp and is not included in the values.
